channel.title: Cant work my Auto miner!
channel.description:
i download da scar program and put the Pentti Multi City Miner & Banker 0.3.scar in it, and i click start and at bottom of screen i get this error:
[code]Failed when compiling Include file C:\Program Files\SCAR 2.03\includes\srl/srl.scar does not exist. Include file C:\Program Files\SCAR 2.03\includes\srl/srl/skill/mining.scar does not exist. Include file C:\Program Files\SCAR 2.03\includes\SRL/SRL/Misc/Trade.scar does not exist. Include file C:\Program Files\SCAR 2.03\includes\srl/srl/skill/Fighting.scar does not exist. Failed when compiling[/code]
Can anyone help me?

item.title: Cant work my Auto miner!
item.dc:creator: @dudeofthed dudeofthed
item.description:
@dudeofthed wrote:

Well, do you have the SRL installed?
If you’re using a newer version of SCAR, you have to re-install the SRL into the new scars inludes folder.

Read full topic

item.title: Cant work my Auto miner!
item.dc:creator: @wazup wazup
item.description:
@wazup wrote:

well it now {.include srl\srl.scar} {.include srl\srl\skill\mining.scar} {.include SRL\SRL\Misc\Trade.scar} {.include srl\srl\skill\Fighting.scar} when i save and start i get {.include srl\srl.scar} {.include srl\srl\skill\mining.scar} {.include SRL\SRL\Misc\Trade.scar} {.include srl\srl\skill\Fighting.scar} still

Read full topic

item.title: Cant work my Auto miner!
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

Mopman:

Should those slashes not be going the other way, ie ?

Yes, yes they should.

{.include srl\srl.scar}
{.include srl\srl\skill\mining.scar}
{.include SRL\SRL\Misc\Trade.scar}
{.include srl\srl\skill\Fighting.scar}

Read full topic

item.title: Cant work my Auto miner!
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

Should those slashes not be going the other way, ie ?

Read full topic

item.title: Cant work my Auto miner!
item.dc:creator: @wazup wazup
item.description:
@wazup wrote:

[quote=“dudeofthed, post:2, topic:80896”][quote author=highlife link=topic=118843.msg1167098#msg1167098 date=1176729936]
i download da scar program and put the Pentti Multi City Miner & Banker 0.3.scar in it, and i click start and at bottom of screen i get this error:

Failed when compiling Include file C:\Program Files\SCAR 2.03\includes\srl/srl.scar does not exist. Include file C:\Program Files\SCAR 2.03\includes\srl/srl/skill/mining.scar does not exist. Include file C:\Program Files\SCAR 2.03\includes\SRL/SRL/Misc/Trade.scar does not exist. Include file C:\Program Files\SCAR 2.03\includes\srl/srl/skill/Fighting.scar does not exist. Failed when compiling

Can anyone help me?
[/quote]
Do you have SRL Included?
If you do, can you please post the lines that say {.include srl…}.

Thanks,
Dudeofthed![/quote]

hi highlife my friend he posted this for me ,… anyways

it was from http://www.srl-forums.com/forum/multi-city-miner-t7961.html

and in it i do have

[code]program New;
{.include srl/srl.scar}
{.include srl/srl/skill/mining.scar}
{.include SRL/SRL/Misc/Trade.scar}
{.include srl/srl/skill/Fighting.scar}
Const
{
--------SETUP--------

| MINING PLACES | CODE |
|_____________||
| | |[/code]

Read full topic
